snippet: Mark V. Hurd, Oracle’s co-president, announced that Oracle would have the most comprehensive cloud computing offering for businesses. It could be the reason the company has added 2,000 sales representatives.
abstract: Mark V. Hurd, Oracle’s co-president, announced that Oracle would have the most comprehensive cloud computing offering for businesses. It could be the reason the company has added 2,000 sales representatives.

headline.main: Hurd Sells Oracle's Cloud in the Oracle Style
